main event: A civilian spotted a round silver object the size of a dime in Loving, Texas on December 8, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for one hour,The observer used binoculars to view the object,The object faded from sight after being observed,No azimuth, elevation, or flight path were provided,There is speculation that the object could be a balloon or astronomical in nature.
sighted object: round silver object the size of a dime
